question.title: Friend Requests II: Who Has the Most Friends
question.translatedTitle: 好友申请 II ：谁有最多的好友
hints: Being friends is bidirectional. If you accept someone's adding friend request, both you and the other person will have one more friend.
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists RequestAccepted (requester_id int not null, accepter_id int null, accept_date date null)
insert into RequestAccepted (requester_id, accepter_id, accept_date) values ('1', '2', '2016/06/03')
